div.div: jQuery lives on; major changes teased

#‚Äã639 ‚Äî May 18, 2023
Read on the Web
JavaScript Weekly
Bun's New Bundler: 220x Faster than webpack? ‚Äî Bun is one of the newest JavaScript runtimes (built atop the JavaScriptCore engine) and focuses on speed while aiming to be a drop-in replacement for Node.js. This week‚Äôs v0.6.0 release is the ‚Äòbiggest release yet‚Äô with standalone executable generation and more, but its new JavaScript bundler and minifier may attract most of the attention and this post digs into why. Jarred Sumner
ü§î If you'd prefer to read what a third party thinks, Shane O'Sullivan gave the new bundler a spin and shared his thoughts. There's also some discussion on Hacker News. It's early days and while esbuild may be fast enough for most right now, it's fantastic to see any progress in bundling.
Deopt Explorer: A VS Code Extension to Inspect V8 Trace Log Info ‚Äî A thorough introduction to MS's new tool for performing analysis of the V8 engine‚Äôs internals, including CPU profile data, how inline caches operate, deoptimizations, how functions were run (interpreted or compiled) and more. There‚Äôs a lot going on. Ron Buckton (Microsoft)
Supercharge Your Websites and Applications with Cloudflare ‚Äî Get ready for supercharged speed and reliability with Cloudflare's suite of performance tools. With ultra-fast CDN, smart traffic routing, media optimization, and more, Cloudflare has everything you need to ensure your site or app runs at peak performance. Cloudflare sponsor
jQuery 3.7.0 Released ‚Äî JavaScript Weekly is 638 issues old, or almost 13 years once you take away weeks off, so jQuery was a big deal in our early days. We hold a lot of nostalgia for it, and it remains widely used even if no-one is writing about it anymore üòÜ v3.7 folds the Sizzle selector engine into the core, adds some unitless CSS properties, gains a new uniqueSort method, and ‚Äúmajor changes‚Äù are still promised in future. jQuery lives on! Timmy Willison (jQuery Foundation)
‚ö°Ô∏è IN BRIEF: TC39's Hemanth.HM has begun keeping a list of ES2023 code examples like he did for ES2022, ES2021, and ES2020. ü§î The New Stack has a story about Meta supporting the OpenJS Foundation ‚Äì but who wrote the article is what we found more interesting.. The folks at Meta / Facebook have written about the efficiency gains made in Messenger Desktop by moving from Electron to React Native. One downside to platforms like Cloudflare Workers using V8 isolates has been a lack of support for opening TCP sockets ‚Äì quite an impediement if you want to talk to a RDBMS over TCP or something. Fear no more, Cloudflare Workers has introduced a connect() API for creating TCP sockets from Workers functions. Promise.withResolvers progressed to stage 2 at the latest TC39 meeting.
RELEASES: Node.js 20.2 Rome 12.1 Ember.js 5.0 ‚Äì App framework. Jasmine 5.0 ‚Äì Testing framework. Gatsby 5.10
üìí Articles & Tutorials
How to Get Full Type Support with Plain JavaScript ‚Äî It‚Äôs possible to reap the benefits of TypeScript, yet still write plain JavaScript, as TypeScript‚Äôs analyzer understands types written in the JSDoc format. Pausly
TypeScript's own JS Projects Utilizing TypeScript page has more info on the different levels of strictness you can follow from mere inference on regular JS code through to full on TypeScript with strict enabled.
‚ñ∂ Coding a Working Game of Chess in Pure JavaScript ‚Äî No canvas, either. All using the DOM, SVG, and JavaScript. No AI and it‚Äôs not perfect, but it‚Äôs only 88 minutes long and it‚Äôll give you something to work on.. Ania Kubow
Automate Slack and MS Teams Notifications Using Node.js ‚Äî Quick guide to send and automate messages via Slack, MS Teams, and any other channel from your Node.js applications. Courier.com sponsor
Your Jest Tests Might Be Wrong ‚Äî Is your Jest test suite failing you? You might not be using the testing framework‚Äôs full potential, especially when it comes to preventing state leakage between tests. Jamie Magee
A Guide to Visual Regression Testing with Playwright ‚Äî The Playwright browser control library can form the basis of an end-to-end testing mechanism all written in JavaScript, and comparing the visual output of tests can help show where things are going wrong. Dima Ivashchuk (Lost Pixel)
Create a Real Time Multi Host Video Chat in a Browser with Amazon IVS Amazon Web Services (AWS) sponsor
React Server Components, Next.js App Router and Examples ‚Äî Addy Osmani‚Äôs overview of of the state of React Server Components, the Next.js App Router implementation, other implementations, the move towards hybrid rendering, plus related links. Addy Osmani
..and if React is your thing, the latest issue of React Status is for you.
üõ† Code & Tools
VanJS: A 1.2KB Reactive UI Framework Without JSX ‚Äî A new entrant to an increasingly crowded space, VanJS is particularly light and elegant, and its author has put some serious effort into documenting it and offering tools to convert your HTML to its custom format. It‚Äôs short for vanilla JavaScript, by the way.. GitHub repo. Tao Xin
JavaScript Scratchpad for VS Code (2m+ Downloads) ‚Äî Quokka.js is the #1 tool for exploring/testing JavaScript with edit-continue experience to see realtime execution and runtime values. Wallaby.js sponsor
Introducing Legend-State 1.0: Faster State for React ‚Äî Another state management solution? After a year of effort, Legend State 1.0 claims to be the fastest option ‚Äúon just about every metric‚Äù and they have the benchmarks to prove it. Whatever the case, this thorough intro is worth a look. GitHub repo. Moo‚Ä§do
Starry Night: GitHub-Like Syntax Highlighting ‚Äî Apparently, GitHub‚Äôs own syntax highlighting approach isn‚Äôt open source, but this takes a similar approach and is. It‚Äôs admittedly quite 'heavy' (due to using a WASM build of the Oniguruma regex engine) but that‚Äôs the price of quality. Titus Wormer
Garph 0.5: A Fullstack GraphQL Framework for TypeScript ‚Äî Full-stack ‚Äòbatteries included‚Äô GraphQL APIs without codegen. GitHub repo. Step CI
headless-qr: A Simple, Modern QR Code Library ‚Äî A slimmer adaptation of an older project without the extra code that isn‚Äôt necessary today. Turning the binary into an image is your job, or use something like QRCode.js if you want a canvas-rendered QR code out of the box. Rich Harris
Scroll Btween: Use Scroll Position to Tween CSS Values on DOM Elements ‚Äî Scrolling/parallax libraries tend to feel the same but this one demonstrates some diverse examples with colors, images, and text ‚Äî all with no dependencies. Olivier Blanc
eslint-plugin-check-file: Rules for Consistent Filename and Folder Names ‚Äî Allows you to enforce a consistent naming pattern for file and directory names in projects. Huan
Transformers.js 2.0 ‚Äì Run Hugging Face transformers directly in browser. PrimeReact 9.4 ‚Äì Extensive UI component library. The Lounge 4.4 ‚Äì Cross-platform, self-hosted web IRC client. Faast.js 8.0 ‚Äì Serverless batch computing made simple.
